statements: SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT suspect_name, officer_name FROM crime_data WHERE location = 'Downtown';
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_date FROM crime_data WHERE officer_name = 'Smith';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_date, location, suspect_name, officer_name FROM crime_data;
SELECT crime_type, location, officer_name FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE officer_name='Johnson' ORDER BY crime_date ASC;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crime_data GROUP BY crime_type;
SELECT crime_id, location, suspect_name FROM crime_data WHERE location LIKE '%Main Street%' ORDER BY crime_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, location, date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Assault';
SELECT suspect_name, alias FROM suspects WHERE crime_id = 1;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE location LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT date, crime_type FROM crimes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT suspect_name, alias FROM suspects WHERE crime_id = 1 ORDER BY suspect_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM crimes ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type ORDER BY total_crimes DESC;
SELECT suspect_name, alias, location FROM suspects JOIN crimes ON suspects.crime_id = crimes.id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, location_lat, location_long FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT suspect_name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age;
SELECT officer_name, rank, department FROM officers WHERE department = 'Police';
SELECT crime_id, crime_type, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type LIKE '%Murder%' ORDER BY crime_date ASC;
SELECT crime_type, location_lat, location_long FROM crimes WHERE crime_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT suspect_name, age, gender, criminal_history FROM suspects WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT officer_name, department, rank FROM officers WHERE department = 'Police Department' ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT crime_type, location_lat, location_long FROM crimes WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0 AND location_long BETWEEN -80.0 AND -70.0;
SELECT officer_name, badge_number, department FROM officers WHERE rank = 'Detective' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, location FROM crimes WHERE crime_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT name, department, badge_number FROM police_officers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT crime_type, location, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT description FROM crimes WHERE crime_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 30;
SELECT officer_id, name, department FROM police_officers WHERE department = 'Homicide Unit' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT crime_type, crime_location FROM crimes WHERE crime_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_age FROM suspects ORDER BY suspect_age DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_rank FROM police_officers WHERE officer_rank = 'Detective';
SELECT report_id, report_description FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_age FROM suspects WHERE crime_id = 3 ORDER BY suspect_age DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_rank FROM police_officers ORDER BY officer_rank ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cr.crime_type, cs.crime_rate FROM crimes cr JOIN crime_stats cs ON cr.crime_id = cs.crime_id WHERE cs.crime_rate > 0.5;

SELECT cr.crime_type, cr.crime_location, co.officer_name FROM crimes cr JOIN crime_reports crp ON cr.crime_id = crp.crime_id JOIN police_officers co ON crp.officer_id = co.officer_id WHERE co.officer_rank = 'Detective' ORDER BY cr.crime_date DESC;
